title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - May 28 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - May 28 2022
description:
Andrew McCarthy, National Review, Fox News contributor, brings his experience of over 20 years as an assistant U.S. attorney for the Southern District of New York to C&B to discuss the Trump-Russia Hoax falling apart. Record GOP turnout in Georgia primary bodes well for November. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell on record high Georgia voter turnout: "Shame on the Democrats who pushed the Big Lie that a grand scheme was afoot to prevent millions of Americans from voting. It was never true... The fake hysteria was just a pretext to push a sweeping national takeover of election laws." Callers weigh in the shooting in Texas.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
